New Records: Glenn Maxwell equalled the record for the most T20I centuries
Key Match Events: Maxwell scored an unbeaten 120 off 55 balls, featuring eight sixes and 12 fours
Miscellaneous Highlights: Australia’s total was their fourth highest in T20s
Others: West Indies finished on 207-9 in response
Marcus Stoinis finished the pick of the home side’s attack with 3-36
There was also a bizarre incident in the third ball of the penultimate over of the game when last man Alzarri Joseph appeared to be run out by a throw from Tim David to the non-striker’s end
